channel.title: CNN brk
channel.description: 这是一个追踪CNN brknews的种子

item.title: 拜登总统签署了重要的政府拨款法案，使之成为法律，此前，立法者争分夺秒地避免了政府部分停摆，但另一个最后期限即将到来。
item.description:
President Biden signs key government funding bills into law after lawmakers raced to avert a partial government shutdown – but another deadline is approaching. https://t.co/4GyxWqbnZf

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 9, 2024

item.title: 在一次令人尴尬的失败中，爱尔兰政府承认在修改宪法中所谓 "性别歧视 "语言的投票中败北
item.description:
In an embarrassing defeat, the Irish government conceded that it had lost votes to change what it called "sexist" language in the constitution https://t.co/yUeGYUTefe

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 9, 2024

item.title: 参议院通过避免政府部分停摆的临时法案，拜登将签署该法案。
item.description:
Senate passes stopgap bill to avert a partial government shutdown, clearing it for Biden's signature. https://t.co/L31BB15x8h

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 9, 2024

item.title: 微软公司在对 1 月份首次披露的入侵事件进行更新时表示，俄罗斯国家支持的黑客已进入微软的核心软件系统
item.description:
Russian state-backed hackers gained access to Microsoft's core software systems, company says in update to intrusion first disclosed in January https://t.co/3MAYnjhafT

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 8, 2024

item.title: 唐纳德-特朗普就 E. Jean Carroll 诽谤案判决提出上诉，并交纳 9163 万美元保证金
item.description:
Donald Trump posts $91.63 million bond as he files notice to appeal the judgment against him in E. Jean Carroll defamation case https://t.co/LhSWI7vImX

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 8, 2024

item.title: 美国经济 2 月份新增就业岗位 27.5 万个，超出经济学家预期
item.description:
The US economy added 275,000 jobs in February, more than economists had expected https://t.co/587HSayIoY

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 8, 2024

item.title: 乔-拜登总统将发表举足轻重的国情咨文演讲，为自己的连任辩护。无需有线电视登录或 CNN Max，即可在 CNN 上观看现场直播。
item.description:
President Joe Biden will deliver a high-stakes State of the Union address as he makes his case for reelection.

Watch live coverage on CNN, https://t.co/28h13hCQyS without a cable login or CNN Max. https://t.co/koJj4oR9He

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 8, 2024

item.title: 美国总统拜登计划在国情咨文中抨击特朗普，同时也承认自己的年龄。
item.description:
President Biden plans to swipe at Trump while also acknowledging his own age during the State of the Union, according to excerpts shared with CNNhttps://t.co/GQU1iIp2Hu

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 7, 2024

item.title: 众议院小组一致批准了一项法案，该法案一旦颁布，将禁止所有美国手机和平板电脑使用 TikTok。
item.description:
House panel unanimously approves bill that could ban TikTok from all US phones and tablets if enacted. https://t.co/djch6Iuipq

— CNN Politics (@CNNPolitics) March 7, 2024

item.title: 官员称，拜登将在今晚的国情咨文演讲中宣布美国军方将在加沙建立一个人道主义援助港口。
item.description:
Biden to announce the US military will establish a port in Gaza for humanitarian aid during tonight's State of the Union speech, officials say. https://t.co/74DdLhYvYq

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 7, 2024

item.title: 在俄罗斯入侵乌克兰的刺激下，瑞典正式加入北约，成为北约第 32 个成员国
item.description:
Sweden officially joins NATO, becoming alliance's 32nd member in a move spurred by Russia's invasion of Ukrainehttps://t.co/Q7b8ST3Z6f

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 7, 2024

item.title: 阿拉巴马州州长签署了新的试管婴儿保护法，因为州最高法院关于冷冻胚胎是儿童的裁决引起了人们对责任的担忧。
item.description:
Alabama's governor signs into law new IVF protections after a state supreme court ruling that frozen embryos are children raised liability concerns. https://t.co/Sesw2crqOH

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 7, 2024

item.title: "2021年，《铁锈》的装甲师汉娜-古铁雷斯-里德（Hannah Gutierrez Reed）在与亚历克-鲍德温（Alec Baldwin）的一场戏中因过失杀人而死亡。
item.description:
"Rust" armorer Hannah Gutierrez Reed found guilty of involuntary manslaughter in 2021 death of film's cinematographer during a scene with Alec Baldwin.https://t.co/vffif3Ja8P

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 6, 2024

item.title: 众议院通过重要政府拨款法案，赶在本周末的最后期限前关闭政府。
item.description:
House passes key government funding bills in rush to beat a shutdown deadline at the end of this week.https://t.co/5db2XVDRYi

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 6, 2024

item.title: 最高法院将于 4 月 25 日就唐纳德-特朗普是否可以在联邦选举颠覆案中要求免于起诉的问题听取辩论
item.description:
The Supreme Court will hear arguments on April 25 over whether Donald Trump may claim immunity from prosecution in federal election subversion case https://t.co/pcChwFwgYh

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 6, 2024

item.title: 美国称，胡塞武装袭击造成至少两名船员死亡，这是该组织在也门附近发动袭击以来造成的首例船上死亡事件
item.description:
At least two crew members are dead after a Houthi strike -- the first on-ship deaths caused by the group since their attacks near Yemen, US says https://t.co/JhMNvjipkF

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 6, 2024

item.title: 明尼苏达州众议员迪安-菲利普斯结束了他在民主党初选中对总统乔-拜登的长期挑战
item.description:
Minnesota Rep. Dean Phillips is ending his long-shot Democratic primary challenge to President Joe Biden https://t.co/pC82jw3e18

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 6, 2024

item.title: 一枚俄罗斯导弹击中乌克兰总统泽连斯基与希腊总理会晤地点附近
item.description:
A Russian missile struck near a meeting between Ukrainian President Zelensky and Greece's prime ministerhttps://t.co/1AwB6eCSwz

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 6, 2024

item.title: 参议院共和党领袖米奇-麦康奈尔（Mitch McConnell）宣布将支持唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）竞选总统。
item.description:
Senate GOP Leader Mitch McConnell announces he'll support Donald Trump for the presidency, a move that comes more than three years after they last spoke https://t.co/qgSGrvjNwJ

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 6, 2024

item.title: 尼基-黑莉在 "超级星期二 "失利后暂停参加共和党总统竞选，唐纳德-特朗普成为推定提名人
item.description:
Nikki Haley suspends her GOP presidential campaign after Super Tuesday losses, leaving Donald Trump as the presumptive nominee https://t.co/9D3hRSCUcz

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 6, 2024

item.title: 据熟悉尼基-黑莉计划的消息人士透露，她将于今天宣布退出总统竞选
item.description:
Nikki Haley will announce today that she is exiting the presidential race, according to sources familiar with her plans https://t.co/i1z6wDjIUU

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 6, 2024

item.title: 据美国有线电视新闻网（CNN）报道，民主党众议员亚当-希夫（Adam Schiff）和共和党人史蒂夫-加维（Steve Garvey）将在加州参议员竞选中晋级，角逐已故黛安-范斯坦（Dianne Feinstein）的席位。
item.description:
Democratic Rep. Adam Schiff and Republican Steve Garvey will advance in California's Senate race for the late Dianne Feinstein's seat, CNN projects https://t.co/8ET0d8OOdL

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 6, 2024

item.title: CNN 预测民主党众议员亚当-希夫在加州参议院 争夺黛安-范斯坦席位的竞选中胜出现在预测他在 11 月的对手还为时过早。
item.description:
CNN projection: Democratic Rep. Adam Schiff advances in California's Senate race for Dianne Feinstein's seat. It's too soon to project who he'll face in November. https://t.co/eSQbfa5AMM

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 6, 2024

item.title: CNN 预测众议员科林-阿尔雷德将赢得得克萨斯州民主党参议员提名，并在 11 月迎战共和党人特德-克鲁兹
item.description:
CNN projection: Rep. Colin Allred will win the Texas Democratic nomination for US Senate and face Republican Ted Cruz in November https://t.co/aPVmkOafpt

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 6, 2024

item.title: CNN 预测：拜登和特朗普在加利福尼亚州赢得当晚最大奖项，黑莉在佛蒙特州出人意料地获胜
item.description:
CNN projection: Biden and Trump win the biggest prize of the night in California, and Haley pulls off surprising win in Vermont https://t.co/LP6scsJEZG

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 6, 2024

item.title: 据美国有线电视新闻网（CNN）预测，杰森-帕尔默将赢得美属萨摩亚民主党总统党团会议，拜登将成为本初选季迄今为止唯一的败将
item.description:
Jason Palmer will win the American Samoa Democratic presidential caucuses, CNN projects, handing Biden his only defeat so far this primary season https://t.co/y1zivkEXuX

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 6, 2024

item.title: CNN 预测：共和党副州长马克-罗宾逊和民主党总检察长乔希-斯坦将在北卡罗来纳州州长竞选中对决
item.description:
CNN projection: Republican Lt. Gov. Mark Robinson and Democratic Attorney General Josh Stein will face each other in North Carolina governor's race https://t.co/roSOgZQTkY

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 6, 2024

item.title: 随着一些州的投票结束，"超级星期二 "的投票结果也在不断出炉。以下是目前的进展情况。
item.description:
Results from Super Tuesday continue to roll in as polls close in some states. Here's where things stand right now. https://t.co/AhgVRnrLl2

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 6, 2024

item.title: 参议员鲍勃-梅嫩德斯因涉及埃及和卡塔尔政府的贿赂计划而面临十几项新的刑事指控
item.description:
Sen. Bob Menendez faces a dozen new criminal charges related to a bribery scheme involving the governments of Egypt and Qatar https://t.co/Ry89sSv9Qd

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 5, 2024

item.title: 亚利桑那州独立参议员 Kyrsten Sinema 宣布将在今年任期结束时退休
item.description:
Sen. Kyrsten Sinema, an Arizona independent, announces she will retire at the end of her term this year https://t.co/LAUnz9prxN
